Question 92) My Brother The Star, My Mother The Earth My Father The Sun, My Sister the Moon, To My Life Give Beauty, To My Body Give Strength, to My Corn Give Goodness, to My House Give Peace, to My Spirit Give Truth, to My Elders Give Wisdom.
Artistic-cultural productions reveal worldviews of a social group. This poem demonstrates the close relationship between the oral tradition of US indigenous culture and
A) Transmission of eating habits between generations.
B) dependence on the wisdom of their ancestors.
C) Representation of the body in its rituals.
D) Importance of the elements of nature.
E) preservation of the family structure.
